goals.question: What is the distribution of flight delays?
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the frequency of flight delays and the range of delay times.

goals.question: What is the relationship between flight distance and arrival delay?
goals.visualization: Scatter plot of flight distance vs arrival delay
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if there is a correlation between flight distance and arrival delay.

goals.question: What is the distribution of flight cancellations by airline?
goals.visualization: Bar chart of airline vs number of cancellations
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand which airlines have the highest number of flight cancellations.

goals.question: What is the distribution of flight cancellations by month?
goals.visualization: Line chart of month vs number of cancellations
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if there are any seasonal patterns in flight cancellations.

goals.question: What is the distribution of flight delays by day of the week?
goals.visualization: Box plot of day of the week vs departure delay
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if there are any differences in flight delays based on the day of the week.

code:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    plt.hist(data['departure_delay'], bins=50, edgecolor='black')
    plt.xlabel('Departure Delay')
    plt.ylabel('Frequency')
    plt.title('What is the distribution of flight delays?')
    
    if len(plt.xticks()[0]) > 20:
        plt.gca().xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    
    plt.xticks(rotation=45)
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)
chart.show()

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    plt.scatter(data['flight_distance'], data['arrival_delay'])
    plt.xlabel('Flight Distance')
    plt.ylabel('Arrival Delay')
    plt.title('What is the relationship between flight distance and arrival delay?')
    
    if len(plt.xticks()[0]) > 20:
        plt.gca().xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)
chart.show()

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    
    cancellations_by_airline = data[data['Cancelled'] == 1].groupby('Airline')['Cancelled'].count()
    cancellations_by_airline.plot(kind='bar')
    
    plt.title("What is the distribution of flight cancellations by airline?")
    plt.xlabel("Airline")
    plt.ylabel("Number of Cancellations")
    
    if len(plt.xticks()[0]) > 20:
        plt.gca().xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    
    plt.xticks(rotation=45)
    
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)
chart.show()

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    
    data['date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['date'], errors='ignore')
    data['month'] = data['date'].dt.month
    cancellations_by_month = data[data['cancelled'] == 1].groupby('month').size()
    
    plt.plot(cancellations_by_month.index, cancellations_by_month.values)
    
    plt.xlabel('Month')
    plt.ylabel('Number of Cancellations')
    plt.title('What is the distribution of flight cancellations by month?')
    
    if len(plt.xticks()[0]) > 20:
        plt.gca().xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    
    plt.xticks(rotation=45)
    
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)
chart.show()

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.ticker as ticker

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    
    data['DAY_OF_WEEK'] = pd.to_datetime(data['DAY_OF_WEEK'], format='%A', errors='ignore')
    data['DEPARTURE_DELAY'] = data['DEPARTURE_DELAY'].astype(float)
    
    ax = data.boxplot(column='DEPARTURE_DELAY', by='DAY_OF_WEEK', grid=False)
    
    plt.title('What is the distribution of flight delays by day of the week?')
    plt.suptitle('')
    plt.xlabel('Day of the Week')
    plt.ylabel('Departure Delay')
    
    if len(plt.xticks()[0]) > 20:
        ax.xaxis.set_major_locator(ticker.MaxNLocator(20))
    
    plt.xticks(rotation=45)
    
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)
chart.show()
